Class LocalPlayerPMEvent

    org.bukkit.event.Cancellable

    public final class LocalPlayerPMEvent
extends org.bukkit.event.Event
implements org.bukkit.event.Cancellable
    Fired when a private message is sent to a local player from another local player.
